“Subjects returned as alicorns but not long after spell reversal they returned to their original tribes. It is unknown if this is a result of reversing the spell or a lack of time spent in the host mother’s womb.” She wrote rubbing her stomach.

Twilight simply teleported back after that and sat on her bed looking at her notes and trying to process the whirlwind of findings and emotions she had gone through in less than an hour. The sun rose and Twilight was still thinking.

She followed the sunbeam and watched it rest on her notes again. Twilight was suddenly hit by a flash of inspiration. Of course! There are still so many questions I need to answer about the un-birth spell. She said happily standing up.

Ok so I won’t take foals from their parents, that’s wrong, but there are others I can cast the spell on. She said rubbing her hooves together happily. Who knows, maybe this is revolutionary. Twilight continued to ramble off ideas as she got ready for a long day of testing.

Twilight smiled to herself as she slunk her way into the nearby trees as the last of the students began to filter into class. Rubbing her pregnant tummy, Twilight began to imagine each and every single one of the fillies and colts inside the schoolhouse preparing for the day. It was likely from the overactive, child-at-heart imagination of her new daughter Pinkie Pie, but Twilight wasn't one to look away from a sweet little daydream like she was experiencing.

In the daydream, Twilight slowly saw as the fillies and colts sat down at their tables as Cheerilee walked up to the board and looked out at her students. "Okay Class, today we have a special guest arriving to take us all home with her where she will take good care of us. So get properly dressed and ready for your mommy to step inside!" The fillies and colts all smiled warmly to themselves as they reached into their desks and pulled out various foal supplies such as diapers, pacifiers, footie pajamas, blankets, teething rings, and diaper bags. The classroom began walking around, the students helping one-another get ready for the arrival of Mama Twilight, by taping up diapers and zipping up pajamas, several of them put pacifiers in their mouths while others chewed on teething rings or played with various dolls and toy blocks when they were done. "M-Miss Cheerilee?" Spoke a worried Scootaloo as she struggled to get her wings inside of her jammies, "I-I can't get my jammies on!" "If you don't get fully dressed, than Mama Twilight will leave you behind." Scootaloo managed to get her little wings inside, only for her zipper to get stuck as she tried to undo it. "Better hurry, I think that Mama is just outside the door now. And you know how she feels about tardiness." Twilight soon saw as her daydream turned into a nightmare for Scootaloo as small tears began to develop in the fillies eyes as she saw most of the rest of her class already dressed in their pajamas with poofy butts showing underneath them, several students were already playing with blocks or with dolls while the small orange pegasus was apparently going to be left behind.
Twilight had enough of this sorrow and imagined herself walking into the classroom like a superhero fresh from battling the bad guys as she smiled triumphantly at Scootaloo before picking her up and setting her down on top of her desk. "Pr-Princess Twilight." Spoke Scootaloo with an apparent blush, "I-I-I'm sorry, I couldn't get my jammies on properly. The zipper... it is-" Twilight flashed a heroic smile once again, sunlight gleaning off of her perceft teeth. "No pesky zipper is a match for my delicate touch, I will get this done for you, my baby." With a dramatic flourish, Twilight helped to unzip Scootaloos' footie and re-zip it up again in a dramatic fashion, taking care to avoid running it against Scootaloos' fur and her poofy diaper, finishing it at Scootaloos neckline where sunlight once-again glinted off of the Zippers' handle with an audible 'SHING!'
The rest of the classroom erupted into wild cheers at Twilights' seemingly heroic deed, Scootaloo climbing onto Twilights arm and passionately kissing the princess on her lips. "Thank you for saving me, Princess Twilight." "Don't call me 'Princess Twilight'..." proclaimed the lavendar Alicorn dramatically, "...I am your Mommy. And it is my sworn duty to take in all of the Little Ponies of Equestria to make them into my babies forever and ever." Twilight stood upright as she saw Diamond Tiara walk up to her and sit down, her padding making an audible 'fwump!' And crinkled as she sat down to look up hopefully. "Can you be my Mommy too?"
"ABSOLUTELY NOT!" Screamed a shrill voice from the opposite doorway as a familiar older mare stepped inside, her nose upturned and having a ring for a Cutie Mark. Spoiled Rich, Diamond Tiaras' birth mother. "I am not going to have you become a baby to this Princess. Get over here right now missy!" "NO!" yelled Diamond Tiara as she clung to Twilights foreleg, "You are no longer my Mommy! Twilight Sparkle is my Mommy!" "She is right, I am Diamond Tiaras' Mommy! And I will not tolerate any bullies making fun of my babies like you are doing!" Replied Twilight as she cast her magic to remove Spoileds' dress and leave the mare naked on the floor.
"I think it is time I made you learn how to go potty." Spoiled felt herself growing smaller and smaller as she couldn't help herself as she continued to pump baby batter into Twilights hungry cunny, Twilight for the most part maintained her patient and loving smile as she milked away the years from Spoiled Rich through their sexual hunger. 'Gulp!' 'Gulp!' 'GULP!' Twilight smiled as she looked at the newborn Spoiled sitting atop her cunny, the filly beaming with pride at going potty into Mama Twilight like a good baby. Sweet Milk smiled as she felt sleepiness start to overcome her as Twilight lowered the baby towards her vagina, slowly slurping to foal deep into her waiting body. Sweet Milks head was the only thing sticking out of Twilight as she levitated a pacifier into Sweet Milks' mouth as the sleeping filly began to suckle on it, the Alicorn blowing a kiss to the foal as her nether lips pulled the child inside and swallowed it into her womb where she belonged.
"Attagirl, Sweet Milk... Mama Twilight will love you forever and ever..." Twilight opened her eyes to see the entire class smiling up at her as several of them blushed as they saw Sweet Milk vanish into their Mommy, "Come on Babies, there is plenty of room within Mama Twilight for all of you..."

1132112111221121121221212.content:
Twilight contemplated until she finally realized that if she were to "adopt" more foals right now, taking them from the school where there were so many, a few of them might run away and warn the others; maybe even warn the Princesses, then she'd be forced to give her babies back, even though they now belonged to her, even though they filled her heart with so much joy and happiness. Twilight felt a panic attack coming on, but a jostle from Pinkie Pie had stolen her attention as she calmed back down for their sake. Having a Family is going to be harder than I thought. not wanting to have her sons and daughters taken away from her, and seeing somepony start to crest the hill of the schools' path, Twilight looked down at her pregnant belly and rubbed it before deciding to leave before she was noticed.
Returning to the nearby Sugarcube Corner unnoticed was slightly easy as she entered the former abode of her Quintuplet Baby Bakers. This is unreal... 'spoke' an amazed Carrot Cake as he glanced around the storefront, The books always said that astralprojecting would require much concentration, but I barely put any effort into it. Twilight 'felt' a tear roll down her neck as she looked back at 'Pinkie' still hugging her tightly, tears flowing down from her face You would be all alone with nopony left that you once knew, and we would be just gone forever! wailed 'Pinkie' her form shifting to become the little filly that Twilight last saw her as. 'Pinkie' smiled as she kissed Twilight back, her mane and coat practically glowing like a star in that moment as they shared the affection. We realized that you need to do this, for your sake as well as our own. 'Carrot Cake' explained further as 'Pound' floated over to his Dad-Brother. We will try to help you out, Mommy. Cried a happy Twilight as she ran over to hug them, her body passing through their ghostly forms before Twilight was caught in a multi-hued glow of magic as she was carefully lowered onto her hooves. Be careful, there's seven of us inside and growing remember? Twilight blushed as she gently rubbed her pregnant belly, conveying how much she really loved them all.
"So what happens now?" Now? chuckled 'Carrot Cake' as he glided over to the counter as he picked up his apron and put it on, I think we need to get ready for the day. "Can you even bake in this state? I passed right through you after all." Relax Mommy Twilight! smiled 'Pinkie' as she somersaulted overhead in a multiple backflip before reverting into her grown up appearance again, Just go upstairs to sleep off with the others. This is our bakery after all. Twilight felt 'Maud' gently pick up her hoof as she walked over to the stairwell. You will need to try and rest up for tonight, your body may be that of an Alicorn but any pregnancy takes energy out of the Mares. I had to help take care of Mom before Marble, Limestone, and Pinkie were born so I know what I'm doing. no... her son... just hearing that phrase in her mind just conveyed how selfish she was with her other children in adopting them first when somepony else had deserved to be inside of her womb even more, to be where she knew he would be loved and where he belonged...
"Twilight? You're back!" Spike leapt off of the bed as he ran over to give Twilight a hug, however his hug wasn't able to get around her abdomen as much thanks to her pregnant belly. Spike looked down at it in curiosity before looking back up at the princess, "What happened to you, binged too much on cakes and pies at Sugarcube Corner without me?"
11321121112211211212212121222112112122.title: Spike was Awake

113211211122112112122121212221121121222.content:
"In a way, yes. But not the kind of cakes and pies you're thinking of." Said Twilight sitting on the bed. What do you mean Twilight?" Asked Spike. With some hesitation on her part, Twilight told her "son" about what happened over the last couple of days. Spike's mouth hung open in disbelief. "So, yeah. I am now carrying Pinkie Pie and Maud. Along with Mr. and Mrs. Cake. Also Pound and Pumpkin Cake." Said Twilight gently running a hoof along her enlarged belly. Spike was about to say something, when a knock came from the door.

Who is at the door?
113211211122112112122121212221121121222.title: Something like that (truth)

choices: Spike stands dumbfounded by the news
1132112111221121121221212122211211212221.content:
'Maud' opened the door and peered into the bedroom. ...did you tell him? Twilight sighed as she nodded yes. "Are you pulling my leg?" Asked the young drake as he looked between 'Maud' and Twilight, "I thought you said that you had teleported Maud into your womb." Twilight gently rubbed her pregnant belly and wore a soft smile on her face as she looked between it, 'Maud' and Spike. "She is inside, I just learned that they know how to astralproject themselves by using my horn to create a fake body for them to use outside." 'Maud' slowly approached as she offered her hoof out to Spike, who tried to grab it only to have his claws phase through it. "I can choose when I can be solid or transparent. I can even communicate through a mind-network with my new brothers, sisters, and our mom."
Spike turned his attention back to Twilights' round belly as he gently moved his hand to place it on her abdomen as he felt her breathing along with a few presses of Twilights' new babies rubbing against the side of her tummy. "Spike, I'm sorry for not telling you about this the other day." Spoke Twilight as tears rolled down her face, "I just got carried away in my work as usual without thinking through the consequences. But they've forgiven me because thanks to them, I have come to terms with a horrible truth I've been trying to ignore ever since I turned into an Alicorn." almost suddenly, 'Pinkie' appeared inside of the room, passing through the walls as she went over to give Twilight a soft hug "It's okay Mommy, your babies are here with you. We will never die and leave you all alone ever again." Spike looked up at the pink party pony that he saw as a great friend as he regarded this new situation dawning on him. "Twilight... why did you want to tell me this?" Twilight gently pulled herself away from 'Pinkie' as she looked down at Spike with a caring smile.
"Because I love you, my special little guy... my baby boy."
1132112111221121121221212122211211212221.title: Maud Pie

1132112111221121121221212122211211212221.content: "I love too mom." Said Spike hugging his mother. Twilight and Spike crying with joy for several minutes. They knew that they would always be mother and son no matter what. When they were done, Twilight and Spike noticed that the rest of their "family" had gathered in the doorway. They all had tears of joy in their eyes for their new "brother." "So. What do we do now?" Asked Spike. "Well, we need to find a book that contains a spell that will allow me hide my large abdomen. Then, go to Sweet Apple Archers." Replied Twilight slowly getting back to her hooves. "That's okay mama. Pumpkin already found the book in question." Said Carrot Cake ushering to his daughter/sister to show said book. "That wonderful. Thank you so much for this Pumpkin. Mommy is proud of you." Said kissing her daughter on the forehead. Pumpkin Cake giggled and blushed at that.
1132112111221121121221212122211211212221.title: Spike leaps to hug Twilight

choices: Spike has reservations with this idea
1132112111221121121221212122211211212221.content:
"Okay, so the basis of the Spellwork that I had pioneered utilized a modified Age-Change Spell to regress the subjects to an early stage of life and bond them to the spellcaster as their parent." Spoke Twilight, who was now resting on her bed, her 'Children' having shrunken their astral projections to infancy as they read alongside their Mom as they scanned over the machinations with other books being brought in for cross-referencing. "But when you cast the spell on Spike, all that happened to him was that he returned to an Egg." Said 'Pumpkin' as she floated over another book to put it next to the primary one, "We're going to need something more if we are going to keep on adopting Ponyville at this rate. And I think I know just what we might need." "Yes, that could work!" Stated 'Carrot Cake' as he turned the page of another book. "What is it you found, baby bro?" Asked Spike, now getting used to the idea that he has baby brothers and sisters. 'Carrot Cake' looked up from his book towards Spike. "The Spell works on Ponies, but we will need a different method." replied 'Carrot Cake' as he lifted the book up to Mama Twilight who looked over the page before cross-referencing the other works she had gathered on the bed several times before looking up at Spike with a warm smile.
"We need you Spike..." Spoke Mama Twilight as she gently rubbed her beautiful pregnant belly. "Me?" Asked Spike incredulously, "Why me?" "Your genetic code is the missing piece of the puzzle." Replied Twilight as she cast a spell to illuminate a cartoonish representation of Spike next to Twilight as the Spike began to grow bigger slightly, "Your Greed Growth in particular. I think I can craft a spell that will siphon off the majority of that power from you and transfer it into my body that way I can hide my wonderful, beautiful belly from the world and travel much easier without having to struggle and hide all the time." "In order to do that," added 'Pumpkin Cake' as she levitated her own book, "We will need to turn you back into a hatchling again, not all the way back into an egg like before." The Cartoon Spike was shrunk back down to a smaller hatchling size as it crawled towards Twilight. "You will need to crawl through my vagina and into my womb for me to absorb your powers of growth, then transmit that energy directly into all of my babies to have their bodies shrink down so I can fit more inside of me." Twilight dissipated the cartoon.

Twilight's eyes flashed open as she felt something moving inside of her body, and it wasn't the usual shuffling of her new babies trying to get comfortable. Looking down at the source of this discomfort Twilight had wished that she didn't even see the hooded monster looming over her, it looked similar to a minotaur with its stocky build even through the hooded cloak it wore, however it had more goat-like features instead as she saw it look down at her belly as it shifted around.
Twilight soon saw the source of her discomfort: the creatures left arm from the elbow down was pushed inside of her vagina! "I almost got you now, little one." Spoke the creature in a deep gutteral voice, "You thought you could hide yourself away from me by going away from the Sissyphus Meadowlands." Twilight felt the creatures hand close around something as its eyes widened, "But you've made a grave mistake of thinking that I, The Krampus, will ever abandon his hunt." The Krampus seemed to pay no heed to Twilight Sparkle at all even now that she was aware of him as his arm started to pull back out, causing agony for the Princess of Friendship as his entire arm was pulled out of her cunny, his gnarled hands clutching onto something still within her; something struggling to get back inside of her.
Twilight lurched up as she saw the kicking hindlegs of both Pinkie Pie and Maud Pie sticking out of her cunny as the Pie Sisters both struggled against the Krampus' steel-like grip on them to get back inside of Twilights womb for safety. Twilight felt rage course throughout her body as she glared at the Krampus. "LET GO OF MY BABIES!" Screamed the Princess of Friendship as she cast a spell to push away the Krampus in order to save her kids.
